mapper.select: SELECT ic.issued_id, ic.issue_date, ic.is_used, ic.used_date, ic.coupon_id, ic.user_id, c.coupon_name, c.discount_value, c.min_order_amount FROM issued_coupon ic JOIN coupon c ON ic.coupon_id = c.coupon_id WHERE ic.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY ic.issue_date DESC;
mapper.update: UPDATE issued_coupon SET is_used = TRUE, used_date = NOW() WHERE issued_id = #{issuedId} AND user_id = #{userId} AND is_used = FALSE
